No. The only other thing that I recall is that when 15 talking about the note, we both noted that we believed that 16 Juror 1 had said she had been a plaintiff in a personal injury 17 case, which might explain the respondeat superior. I can't say 18 for certain it was in that identical conversation, I believe it 19 was probably was, but I do remember talking about that as well. 20 Q. Let me ask you this.
